con:request.name: request
con:request.con:request: { "appleId":"", "password":"", "reminderList":"Reminders", "priority":1, "title":"Get a birthday present for Lisa", "description":"Call Robert to ask what Lisa likes.", "alarm":"2017-01-01T00:00:00" }

con:restRequest.name: create
con:restRequest.con:request: { "appleId":"${#Project#appleId}", "password":"${#Project#password}", "reminderList":"Reminders", "priority":1, "title":"ias-1", "description":"ias-1 : create reminder - alarm - all elements given", "alarm":"2018-01-01T00:00:00" }

con:config.con:expectedResult: A reminder was generated on the iPhone. The values equal those given in the request.

con:restRequest.name: create
con:restRequest.con:request: { "appleId":"${#Project#appleId}", "password":"${#Project#password}", "reminderList":"Reminders", "priority":1, "title":"ias-9", "description":"ias-9 : create reminder - geofence - arrive - all elements given", "proximity":"ARRIVE", "address":"Harrods, 87-135 Brompton Road, London SW1X 7XL", "locationName":"Harrods", "latitude":"51.4992917", "longitude":"-0.162811" }

con:config.con:expectedResult: A reminder was generated on the iPhone. The values equal those given in the request. The map shows the position given in the request. The reminder is configured to trigger on arrival.

con:restRequest.name: create
con:restRequest.con:request: { "appleId":"${#Project#appleId}", "password":"${#Project#password}", "reminderList":"Reminders", "priority":1, "title":"ias-15", "description":"ias-15 : create reminder - geofence - depart - all elements given", "proximity":"DEPART", "address":"Harrods, 87-135 Brompton Road, London SW1X 7XL", "locationName":"Harrods", "latitude":"51.4992917", "longitude":"-0.162811" }

con:config.con:expectedResult: A reminder was generated on the iPhone. The values equal those given in the request. The map shows the position given in the request. The reminder is configured to trigger on departure.

Requests and responses must not be logged to the file given in the configuration.

All three reminders were generated on the iPhone. The values equal those given in the requests.
